alert.note: Alert for Gogebic; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 1:10AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Gogebic, southwestern Houghton and southeastern Ontonagon Counties through 200 AM EDT/100 AM CDT/... At 110 AM EDT/1210 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Marenisco, or 29 miles southeast of Porcupine Mountains State Park, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paulding and Bruce Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
